content.en: Water quality prediction: Scientists have been exploring the use of artificial intelligence (AI) techniques to predict and evaluate water quality parameters. They have employed various algorithms such as decision trees, neural networks, support vector machines, and regression models to make these predictions. These machine learning models have shown promise in accurately estimating water quality variables and classifying water quality based on indices.
content.da: Forudsigelse af vandkvalitet: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af kunstig intelligens (AI) teknikker til at forudsige og vurdere vandkvalitetsparametre. De har anvendt forskellige algoritmer såsom beslutningstræer, neurale netværk, support vector maskiner og regressionsmodeller til at foretage disse forudsigelser. Disse maskinlæringsmodeller har vist lovende resultater i nøjagtigt at estimere vandkvalitetsvariable og klassificere vandkvalitet baseret på indeks.
